sentences.target_language: Seth le pregunta a kayla, "¿tienes hambre?"

sentences.base_language: kayla says, "yes, I am very hungry"
Seth asks, "do you want to eat tacos"
Kayla says, "hmm, i ate tacos yesterday"
Seth asks, "do you want to cook spaghetti"

sentences.target_language: Kayla dice, "sí, me encanta el spaghetti"

sentences.base_language: seth says, "okay, we need to buy ingredients."
Seth responds, "We need a tomato, onion, garlic, herbs, and noodles"
sentences.target_language: Seth responde, "Necesitamos un tomate, cebolla, ajo, hierbas y noodles"

sentences.base_language: Kayla says, "but the store is closed."
sentences.target_language: Kayla dice, "pero la tienda está cerrada."

sentences.base_language: They both look for the ingredients in their house.
sentences.target_language: Ambos buscan los ingredientes en su casa.

sentences.base_language: Seth finds three tomatoes, one onion, but no noodles.
sentences.target_language: Seth encuentra tres tomates, una cebolla, pero no hay noodles.

sentences.base_language: Seth says, "damnit, we don't have noodles"
Kayla says, "but we have pizza crust.  We can make pizza sauce!"
sentences.target_language: Kayla dice, "pero tenemos masa de pizza. ¡Podemos hacer salsa de pizza!"

sentences.base_language: Seth and Kayla start to cook.
sentences.target_language: Seth y Kayla empiezan a cocinar.

sentences.base_language: after some time they eat the pizza.
sentences.target_language: después de un tiempo se comen la pizza.

sentences.base_language: Seth looks at Kayla and says, "this is good but I like tacos better".
sentences.target_language: Seth mira a Kayla y dice, "esto está bueno pero prefiero los tacos".

sentences.base_language: They argue about that then go to bed.
sentences.target_language: Discuten sobre eso y luego se van a dormir.
